entry.title: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 2:11AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: .Monsoonal moisture in place over the region will lead to multiple periods of thunderstorms capable of heavy rainfall and the rapid onset of flash flooding. This risk will be greatest for known burn scars in southern Mohave County, but several area roads could also experience flooding as a result of the multiple rounds of heavy rainfall through Wednesday night.
